name: Deadly Sales
description:
Tired of the compulsive shoppers on Black Friday? With this game, you will have the satisfaction of redemption

You must protect your store from the shoppers who come on Black Friday to buy cheaper products, you will have some weapons that might help you, each one of those will be unlocked at the end of each round.

It won’t be that easy, you must defend your PS4 pile while at the same time you will have to defend the XBox and Switch ones which will provide resources. If the enemies destroy one of the other two piles you can sacrifice one of your weapons to reconstruct the pile, chose wisely because you won’t be able to use it again in the game.

Will you be able to protect your store or will you let the shoppers destroy everything?
